title: World nuclear power consumption by country 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of nuclear power consumption in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of nuclear power consumption is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Japan.
The highest Country United States has 29.6 more Share of nuclear power consumption than the lowest Country Japan.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of nuclear power consumption for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Share of nuclear power consumption 31.4 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Japan where Share of nuclear power consumption is 1.8.
